column1: If it rains, we will stay home.
column2: 如果下雨，我们就会待在家里。

column1: If you study hard, you will pass the exam.
column2: 如果你努力学习，你就会通过考试。

column1: If the weather is nice, we will go for a walk.
column2: 如果天气好，我们就会去散步。

column1: If she calls me, I will tell her the news.
column2: 如果她给我打电话，我就会告诉她这个消息。

column1: If he arrives late, we will start without him.
column2: 如果他来晚了，我们就会不等他开始。

column1: If we miss the bus, we will take a taxi.
column2: 如果我们错过公交车，我们就会打出租车。

column1: If they finish the work, they will get paid.
column2: 如果他们完成了工作，他们就会得到报酬。

column1: If you feel tired, you should rest.
column2: 如果你感到疲倦，你应该休息。

column1: If I have time, I will help you.
column2: 如果我有时间，我会帮你。

column1: If the train is delayed, we will be late.
column2: 如果火车晚点了，我们就会迟到。

column1: If you don't eat, you will be hungry.
column2: 如果你不吃东西，你就会饿。

column1: If it gets dark, we will turn on the lights.
column2: 如果天黑了，我们就会开灯。

column1: If she is sick, she will see a doctor.
column2: 如果她生病了，她就会去看医生。

column1: If he knows the answer, he will tell us.
column2: 如果他知道答案，他就会告诉我们。

column1: If we win the game, we will celebrate.
column2: 如果我们赢了这场比赛，我们就会庆祝。

column1: If they arrive early, they will wait for us.
column2: 如果他们来得早，他们就会等我们。

column1: If you are thirsty, you can drink water.
column2: 如果你渴了，你可以喝水。

column1: If I see him, I will say hello.
column2: 如果我看见他，我会打招呼。

column1: If the store is open, we will buy some milk.
column2: 如果商店开着，我们就会买些牛奶。

column1: If you need help, just ask.
column2: 如果你需要帮助，尽管问。
